name: Attack
note:
Skill #1 will be used when you select
the Attack command.

name: Guard
note:
Skill #2 will be used when you select
the Guard command.

description: You make a task more blue/less red and deal extra damage to Bosses!
name: Brutal Smash

description: You crouch low and gain a buff to Constitution!
name: Defensive Stance

description: Your boldness buffs your whole Party's Strength!
name: Valorous Presence

description: Your fierce stare buffs your whole Party's Constitution!
name: Intimidating Gaze

description: You summon XP and deal fiery damage to Bosses!
name: Burst Of Flames

description: You sacrifice Mana so the rest of your Party, except Mages, gains MP!
name: Etheral Surge

description: Your mental power shakes the earth and buffs your Party's Intelligence!
name: Earthquake

description: With one cast, ice freezes all your streaks so they won't reset to zero tomorrow!
name: Chilling Frost

description: A burst of light makes your tasks more blue/less red!
name: Searing Brightness

description: You shield your Party by buffing their Constitution!
name: Protective Aura

description: Your soothing spell restores your whole Party's health!
name: Blessing

description: You rob a nearby task and gain gold!
name: Pickpocket

description: You betray a foolish task and gain gold and XP!
name: Backstab

description: Your tricky talents buff your whole Party's Perception!
name: Tools of the Trade

description: With each cast, a few of your undone Dailies won't cause damage tonight. Their streaks and colors won't change.
name: Stealth
